message: Here's my first offer. I believe this division will be beneficial for both of us to secure a good amount.

Alice, by rejecting my proposal you risk moving into a scenario where, due to the devaluation from waiting, you'll end up with nothing. Accepting now preserves all possible value. I urge you to consider that turning down this offer leaves you with no better alternative. Looking forward to a swift agreement.
In light of the current situation, I propose a more balanced approach. This way, we both get a substantial amount and avoid losing everything.

Alice, if you reject this offer, you'll be in position to propose in the next round, but due to further inflation you can expect a payoff of about 65% of the current pie. To avoid additional devaluation and ensure you secure that value, Iâ€™m offering you 65.24% of the current amount now. Let's settle efficiently and avoid further losses.
